title: Can Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond be sent to the Graveyard by its own effect?
question: Can Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond be sent to the Graveyard by its own effect?
llm_answer: **No,** Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond **cannot** be sent to the Graveyard by its own effect. Its effect specifically states that you can send **another** face-up "Gem-Knight" monster you control to the Graveyard, not itself. The scenario will resolve with Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond remaining on the field.
